ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) package dry instant long grain and wild rice mix
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles, drained

cookingTips: Cook rice according to package directions before combining with other ingredients for better texture control
Reserve some cheese for topping to create a golden, crusty top layer
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you build layers of flavor and texture in a simple rice casserole using cheese and chiles?
